version_description:
BRAND NEW selfie camera!
Introducing SODA, a camera for quick and effortless beauty.

New filter added!
Now you can take a perfect selfie with over 20 new trendy filters. :)

The filter name is changed.
• C1 -> NA1
• C2 -> NA4
• M1 -> NA3
• M2 -> TR2
• V1 -> SP2
• V2 -> DA3
• F1 -> TR4
• F2 -> SP1

New filter added!
Now you can take a perfect selfie with over 20 new trendy filters. :)

The filter name is changed.
• C1 -> NA1
• C2 -> NA4
• M1 -> NA3
• M2 -> TR2
• V1 -> SP2
• V2 -> DA3
• F1 -> TR4
• F2 -> SP1

Introducing new features!

• The latest version supports full-screen mode.
• Music stopping bugs have been fixed.
• Taking photos with the volume button without having to set the timer

We've added new features!

• You can now use five special filters for the wintry season.
• Enhance your photos using the Portrait effect.
• Add filters or other beauty effects to your photos even after taking them.

We've added new features!

• You can now use five special filters for the wintry season.
• Enhance your photos using the Portrait effect.
• Add filters or other beauty effects to your photos even after taking them.

We've added new features! 

• Analog vibe with our new Special filters.
Performance improvements and bug fixes

New features added!

- Upgraded tone-up feature has been added!
In Photo Edit, find the new tone up feature that naturally brightens the skin tone only.

New features added!

- Upgraded tone-up feature has been added!
In Photo Edit, find the new tone up feature that naturally brightens the skin tone only.

New features added!
- Spice up your photos using the new "STYLE" feature.
- Minor improvements and bug fixes

New features added!
- Spice up your photos using the new "STYLE" feature.
- Minor improvements and bug fixes

New features added!

• You can now record up to 3 minutes of video.
• You can add your beloved filters to Favorites.
• New filters added! (Coral, Velvet)
• New makeup added! (Sugar, Darling, Picnic, Dahlia)
• Makeup now features a more natural look.

We've added new features!

• Try on natural makeup for a fresh, healthy look in your selfies.
• Easily switch to video mode when recording videos.
• You can now record videos up to 1 minute long.

New features added!

- Edit your photos simply by dragging your finger on the screen.
- You can now record up to 10 minutes of video.
- Beauty effects can now be applied even to your videos.

We've added new features!

• Try on natural makeup for a fresh, healthy look in your selfies.
• Easily switch to video mode when recording videos.
• You can now record videos up to 1 minute long.

- 'Album' feature added to Discover. Apply various styles in the Discover to the photos in your gallery.
- Style 'Favorite' added! Now you can favorite and use the style you like.

- 'Album' feature added to Discover. Apply various styles in the Discover to the photos in your gallery.
- Style 'Favorite' added! Now you can favorite and use the style you like.

SODA Beauty Full Upgrade, Meet the enhanced beauty effect!
- A natural face feature has been added.
- 17 new Advanced Beauty effects such as Clear, Texture, Eye incision, and M-shaped have been added.

Now, with a more delicate and natural beauty effect, create a beauty effect that's perfect for you!
New beauty effects are available for both shooting and editing.

Meet the new true-to-nature Original Mode, providing clear, high-definition color displays just like a real camera shot.
- Switch between the previous SODA Natural Mode and Original Mode to find the best fit for your photo.
- Your favorite and go-to settings are saved on the mode ready for your next visit.

・ Live Photo mode released!
- Take shots 1.5 seconds before and after, and make your photo come to life with Live Photo.
- You can also select the shots you like and save them separately.

・ The layout shot feature has been added. Try a variety of split layouts to complete your charming selfie.
